text: The Salvos of the Aurora Cruiser () is a 1965 Soviet drama film directed by Yuri Vyshinsky.Крейсер «Аврора», автомобиль Ленина и… чайникПризрак бродит по экрану«Аврора» выплывет на «Ленфильме» == Plot == The film takes place in Petrograd in October 1917. Lenin is going to organize an armed uprising, while Zinoviev is against it. Most members of the Central Committee support Lenin. The Russian Provisional Government sends its troops to the Winter Palace, and the commander of Aurora Erickson receives an order to go to sea...Залп «Авроры» == Cast == * Sergey Boyarskiy * Zinaida Kirienko * Mikhail Kuznetsov * Pavel Luspekayev * Mikhail YekaterininskyЗалп Авроры (1965) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1965 films Category:Russian- language films Category:Soviet drama films Category:Soviet films
title: The Salvos of the Aurora Cruiser
